metadata.title: CVE-2021-22219 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: All versions of GitLab CE/EE starting from 9.5 before 13.10.5, all versionsstarting from 13.11 before 13.11.5, and all versions starting from 13.12before 13.12.2 allow a high privilege user to obtain sensitive informationfrom log files because the sensitive information was not correctlyregistered for log masking.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
